0.2.0.name: wordpress/wedgeprint
0.2.0.description: WedgePrint plugin for wordpress allows you to show your blog readers short time visual screen-size messages before the content actually loads. Messages can be funny, commercial or whatever you want. This plugin is in 'beta' phase at the moment, so 'handle with care', which translates into: be careful in its use. It is recommended to try it first in a pre-production environment and closely inspect blog statistics for undesirable effects the first days in production mode. The plugin controls through 'cookies' the number of messages a reader gets per hour: now variable!, so readers don't feel saturated ;) Visit our web page WedgePrint.net and please follow our guidelines and warnings. You are welcome to give us feedback about this project, feel free to take a look at the code.
